heatmap.noShortcuts: No shortcuts found for this key

footer.description: Professional keyboard shortcuts navigation platform for developers

meta.title: KeyFlow - Developer Keyboard Shortcuts Navigation Platform
meta.description: KeyFlow is a professional keyboard shortcuts navigation platform providing comprehensive shortcut collections for mainstream IDEs and editors like VSCode, IntelliJ IDEA, WebStorm, PyCharm. Features interactive heatmaps and global search to boost developer productivity.
meta.keywords: keyboard shortcuts, developer tools, VSCode shortcuts, IntelliJ IDEA shortcuts, WebStorm shortcuts, PyCharm shortcuts, programmer tools, IDE shortcuts, editor shortcuts, development efficiency

toolGrid.name: Name
toolGrid.clickHeartToFavorite: Click the heart icon on tool cards to favorite tools
toolGrid.noCategoryTools: No tools in this category yet

toolDetail.heatmapDescription: Click keyboard keys to view corresponding shortcuts, color depth indicates usage frequency

shortcutList.adjustFilters: Try adjusting search criteria or filter options

searchResults.tryDifferentKeywords: Try using different keywords or check spelling

toolDescriptions.vscode: Microsoft's lightweight code editor with support for multiple programming languages and rich plugin ecosystem.
toolDescriptions.sublime: High-performance text editor known for its fast response and powerful multi-cursor editing features.
toolDescriptions.intellij-java: JetBrains' Java IDE providing powerful code analysis, refactoring, and debugging features, the preferred tool for Java development.
toolDescriptions.eclipse: Open-source integrated development environment primarily used for Java development, supporting multiple programming languages.
toolDescriptions.android-studio: Google's official Android app development IDE, built on IntelliJ IDEA.
toolDescriptions.xcode: Apple's official IDE for iOS and macOS app development, runs only on macOS.
toolDescriptions.hbuilderx: Professional front-end IDE developed by DCloud, optimized for uni-app and 5+App development.
toolDescriptions.webstorm: JetBrains' professional web front-end IDE providing powerful support for JavaScript and related technologies.
toolDescriptions.goland: JetBrains' Go language IDE providing intelligent code assistance, debugging, and testing tools for Go development.
toolDescriptions.pycharm: JetBrains' Python IDE providing intelligent code completion, inspection, debugging, and refactoring features.
toolDescriptions.clion: JetBrains' C/C++ development environment providing intelligent code assistance and powerful debugging features.
toolDescriptions.atom: Open-source text editor developed by GitHub, highly customizable, though discontinued but still has many users.
toolDescriptions.photoshop: Adobe's professional image editing software, the industry standard for digital image processing.
toolDescriptions.figma: Modern collaborative UI design tool supporting real-time collaboration and prototyping.
toolDescriptions.chrome-devtools: Built-in developer tools in Google Chrome browser for web debugging and performance analysis.
toolDescriptions.firefox-devtools: Built-in developer tools in Mozilla Firefox browser providing powerful web debugging and analysis features.

shortcutDescriptions.show_in_new_window: Show Active File in New Window/Instance
